achievements.name: ACH_HONK_A_CLOWNS_NOSE
achievements.description: Honk the noses of 10 Clowns.

achievements.name: ACH_INCENDIARY_CLOWN_POSSE
achievements.description: Using a Molotov, burn a Clown leading at least 10 Common Infected.

achievements.name: ACH_MELEE_A_CHARGER
achievements.description: Kill a Charger with a melee weapon while they are charging.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_SPITTER_FAST
achievements.description: Kill a Spitter before she is able to spit.

achievements.name: ACH_FINISH_CAMPAIGN_MELEE_ONLY
achievements.description: Finish a campaign using only melee weapons.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_EVERY_UNCOMMON_INFECTED
achievements.description: Kill one of each Uncommon Infected.

achievements.name: ACH_SAVE_PLAYER_FROM_JOCKEY_FAST
achievements.description: Kill a Jockey within 2 seconds of it jumping on a Survivor.

achievements.name: ACH_CUT_OFF_HEADS_MELEE
achievements.description: Decapitate 200 Infected with a melee weapon.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_LEAVE_SAFE_ROOM_DEFIB_TEAMMATE
achievements.description: In a Versus round, leave the saferoom to defibrillate a dead teammate.

achievements.name: ACH_BEAT_CAMPAIGNS_EXPERT_MODE
achievements.description: Survive all campaigns on Expert.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_EXPERT_REALISM
achievements.description: Survive a campaign on Expert skill with Realism mode enabled.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_FORM_PARTY_AND_WIN_4V4
achievements.description: Form a team and beat an enemy team in 4v4 Versus or Scavenge.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_SUBMERGED_MUDMEN
achievements.description: Kill 10 swampy Mudmen while they are in the water.

achievements.name: ACH_COLLECT_CEDA_VIALS
achievements.description: Collect 10 vials of Boomer vomit from infected CEDA agents you have killed.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_ZOMBIES_GRENADE_BLAST
achievements.description: Kill 15 Infected with a single grenade launcher blast.

achievements.name: ACH_IGNITE_INFECTED_FIRE_AMMO
achievements.description: Ignite 50 Common Infected with incendiary ammo.

achievements.name: ACH_DEPLOY_AMMO_UPGRADE
achievements.description: Deploy an ammo upgrade and have your team use it.

achievements.name: ACH_RES_SURVIVORS_WITH_DEFIB
achievements.description: Revive 10 dead Survivors with the defibrillator.

achievements.name: ACH_SPEED_REVIVE_WITH_ADRENALINE
achievements.description: Revive 10 incapacitated Survivors while under the speed-boosting effects of adrenaline.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_INFECTED_WITH_CHAINSAW
achievements.description: Kill 100 Common Infected with the chainsaw.

achievements.name: ACH_BILE_A_TANK
achievements.description: Use a bile bomb on a Tank.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_WITH_EVERY_MELEE
achievements.description: Use every melee weapon to kill Common Infected.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_TANK_MELEE_ONLY
achievements.description: Kill a Tank with melee weapons.

achievements.name: ACH_BRIDGE_TIMED_RUN
achievements.description: Cross the bridge finale in less than three minutes.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_MALL
achievements.description: Survive the Dead Center campaign.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_ROAD
achievements.description: Survive the Dark Carnival campaign.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_SWAMP
achievements.description: Survive the Swamp Fever campaign.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_TOWN
achievements.description: Survive the Hard Rain campaign.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_BRIDGE
achievements.description: Survive the Parish campaign.

achievements.name: ACH_IMPOUND_LOT_NO_ALARMS
achievements.description: Navigate the impound lot and reach the cemetery safe room without tripping any alarms.

achievements.name: ACH_GNOME_RESCUE
achievements.description: Rescue Gnome Chompski from the Carnival.

achievements.name: ACH_WITCH_TOWN_NO_WITCH_KILLS
achievements.description: Navigate the sugar mill and reach the safe room without killing any Witches.

achievements.name: ACH_AIRLINE_FINALE_NO_DAMAGE
achievements.description: Defend yourself at the crashed airliner without taking damage.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_JOCKEY_LONG_RIDE
achievements.description: As the Jockey, ride a Survivor for more than 12 seconds.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_JOCKEY_TWO_PLAYERS
achievements.description: As the Jockey, ride the Survivors twice in a single life.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_JOCKEY_INTO_ACID
achievements.description: As the Jockey, ride a Survivor and steer them into a Spitter's acid patch.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_SPIT_ON_ENEMY_TEAM
achievements.description: As the Spitter, hit every Survivor with a single acid patch.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_SPIT_ON_SMOKERED_PLAYER
achievements.displayName: A SPITTLE HELP FROM MY FRIENDS
achievements.description: As the Spitter, spit on a Survivor being choked by a Smoker.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_BOWL_ENEMY_TEAM
achievements.description: As the Charger, bowl through the entire enemy team in a single charge.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_CHARGER_GROUND_SMASH
achievements.description: As the Charger, grab a Survivor and smash them into the ground for a solid 15 seconds.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_CHARGER_LONG_CARRY
achievements.description: As the Charger, grab a Survivor and carry them over 80 feet.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVAL_GET_MEDAL_MELEE_ONLY
achievements.description: In a Survival round, get a medal only using melee weapons.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_WIN_A_GAME
achievements.description: Win a game of Scavenge.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_COLLECT_CAN_GRIND
achievements.description: Collect 100 gas cans in Scavenge.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_COLLECT_ALL_CANS
achievements.description: Collect 15 gas cans in a single Scavenge round.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_SHUT_OUT
achievements.description: Stop the enemy team from collecting any gas cans during a Scavenge round.

achievements.name: ACH_STRONGMAN_GAME
achievements.description: Prove you are stronger than Moustachio.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_MAKE_SURVIVOR_DROP_CAN
achievements.description: Make a Survivor drop a gas can during overtime.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_CAN_DROP_GRIND
achievements.description: Cause 25 gas can drops as a Special Infected.

achievements.name: ACH_STASH_WHACKER
achievements.description: Prove you are faster than Moustachio.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_THE_PASSING
achievements.description: Survive The Passing Campaign.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_CHARGE_THROUGH_CHAIRS
achievements.description: As the Charger, grab a Survivor and crash them through 8 chairs at the wedding.

achievements.name: ACH_KILLS_WITH_M60
achievements.description: Using the M60, kill 25 infected without letting go of the trigger.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_FALLEN_SURVIVOR
achievements.description: Collect 10 items dropped by a Fallen Survivor.

achievements.name: ACH_COMPLETE_CHALLENGE_MODES
achievements.description: Play 6 Mutations.

achievements.name: ACH_HEADS_WITH_GOLF_CLUB
achievements.description: Knock off the heads of 18 infected with the golf club.

achievements.name: ACH_HEAR_BALLAD
achievements.displayName: KILLING THEM SWIFTLY TO THIS SONG
achievements.description: Play the new Midnight Riders song on a jukebox.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_TANK_L4D1_ONLY
achievements.description: Kill a Tank only with damage from the original Survivors.

achievements.name: ACH_OPEN_FOOT_LOCKERS
achievements.description: Open 5 foot lockers.

achievements.name: ACH_SCAVENGE_PLAY_C6_FINALE
achievements.description: Play 5 full games of Scavenge on The Port.

achievements.name: ACH_COMPLETE_THE_SACRIFICE
achievements.description: Complete "The Sacrifice".

achievements.name: ACH_SACRIFICE_BILL
achievements.description: Have Bill sacrifice himself for the team.

achievements.name: ACH_KILL_SPECIAL_WITH_BARREL
achievements.description: Kill a Special Infected with an exploding barrel.

achievements.name: ACH_RUN_ALL_GENERATORS
achievements.description: Have all 3 generators running at once in "The Sacrifice" finale.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_PREVENT_SACRIFICE
achievements.description: As a Special Infected, incap someone who is trying to sacrifice themselves.

achievements.name: ACH_SURVIVE_COLD_STREAM
achievements.description: Survive the Cold Stream campaign on any difficulty.

achievements.name: ACH_VS_COMPLETE_DEAD_AIR
achievements.description: Play a Versus game on Dead Air from start to finish.

achievements.name: ACH_COLLECT_HOLIDAY_GIFTS
achievements.description: Collect three gifts dropped by Special Infected in Versus Mode.

achievements.name: ACH_HELP_FREE_PLAYER_SURVIVE
achievements.description: Plays games with free weekend players and helps them survive a campaign.
